00001 /*
00002  * KTWindowFunction.hh
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: Sep 18, 2011
00005  *      Author: nsoblath
00006  *
00007  *      Notes: The width of the function will always be adjusted to make an integral number of bins, given the bin width.
00008  *             The bin width is always fixed to what the user specifies.
00009  *             The window is centered around 0; there will always be an equal number of bins above and below 0.
00010  *             However, the bin numbering starts with 0 at the _left edge_ of the window! (i.e. negative bins are to the left of the window)
00011  */
00012

00017 
00018 class TH1D;
